channel.title: Staminus just got ddos'd
channel.description:
Yes,
The DDOS protection hoster just got taken down themselves.
Discuss.

item.title: Staminus just got ddos'd
item.dc:creator: @The_AFKer The_AFKer
item.description:
@The_AFKer wrote:

If you’re going to be running Linux (standard distros are usually Ubuntu or centOS), and using X (window manager) with a desktop env (most likely GNOME), with minimal services including a webserver, then around 500-600mb in memory more or less.

With RSCA added into it, you’ll surpass the 2GB limit easily as it uses a set memory limit (can change it by reducing the amount).

Read full topic

btw mapoo staminus was not taken down they had 2 routing problems. (which is fixed now)

item.title: Staminus just got ddos'd

Stam has been going up and down for days, but currently they’re up.

An admin in the RSC section. You don’t see that too often. Good riddance to barbrady.[/quote]

item.title: Staminus just got ddos'd
item.dc:creator: @Officer_Barbrady Officer Barbrady
item.description:
@Officer_Barbrady wrote:

[quote=“Ecko, post:32, topic:367448”][quote author=Officer Barbrady link=topic=463612.msg3392479#msg3392479 date=1289073389]

And yours does lol?

Apparently it does, you’re raging over these words.

And yours does lol?

failure

[/quote]
The words “And yours does lol?” do not imply any rage whatsoever.[/quote]

…That wasn’t even the post that I was talking about. Get with the program or get out.

[quote=“Mopman, post:33, topic:367448”][quote author=Officer Barbrady link=topic=463612.msg3392506#msg3392506 date=1289074553]
And obviously so can I; Have you not figured why your community disregards your hypocritical, biased rules/administrators? Take a look at that first sentence until something hits you.

You obviously can’t take criticism or opinions too well, so… I see absolutely no reason to send you a message.
[/quote]

I can take criticism fine when it’s in the right place - feel free.

In case the “I can do what I want bit” wasn’t clear enough - what I was actually saying was “stop discussing this here or I will mute you”. I just thought one was more friendly.[/quote]

The discussion will cease once you stop. Also may I suggest walking outside; That power has clearly gone to your head.

Read full topic
